name: 247 Techies
overview:
24/7 Techies is a technical support company that operates with the goal of delivering an outstanding service to its clients. Growing at an encouraging rate, our services have been well received globally. Our company is built around the technical expertise of our enthusiastic team which is made up of certified professionals who enjoy what they do. Reaching across continents, our expert techies have made thousands of lives easier from the United States of America to Australia and Canada to the United Kingdom. We believe in our ability to come up with fast and simple solutions no matter how dire the situation may be.

24/7 Techies specializes in delivering remote tech support to the global Micro SMB sector. Our pricing plans are uniquely affordable and present a varied list of great services which spans from server maintenance to virus removal. Our world class IT solutions can be acquired by simply subscribing for a yearly plan or a one-time offer by registering on our website or giving us a call. Our tech team works 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and we guarantee that you will receive a satisfactory service.

Armed with the best tools in the business, our remote support team is not automated and is powered by real people with years of experience and skill. 24/7 Techies is a Microsoft Certified Gold partner company which also boasts one of the highest Net Promoter Scores within the industry.

funding_rounds.source_description: Remote Tech Support Firm, 24/7 Techies, Raises $600k Seed Round — Led By 500 Startups — To Ramp Up SMB Business
